text:
Im found little pb if enable deflate module and disable dso :
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_dso_load'
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_dso_unload'
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_dso_sym'
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_dso_error'
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_os_dso_handle_put'
 .../server/exports.c: undefined reference to `apr_os_dso_handle_get'
Regards
Rmkml
creator: rmkml@free.fr

text:
You passed --disable-dso to configure?

It looks like you disabled DSO support in APR, not just disabling mod_so in httpd.

Try --enable-deflate=static and only pass --disable-so, instead of --disable-dso.
creator: chip@force-elite.com
